channel.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters
channel.description: Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

image.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters

item.title: 固态：电动汽车巨头追逐电池的“圣杯”
item.description: Solid-state batteries hold the promise of more energy storage, longer driving ranges and faster charging for next-generation electric vehicles. Yet despite decades of research and billions of dollars invested, their future still looks elusive.翻译:固态电池有望为下一代电动汽车提供更多的能量存储、更长的行驶里程和更快的充电速度。然而，尽管经过数十年的研究和数十亿美元的投资，它们的未来仍然显得难以捉摸。
item.author: Eric Onstad

item.title: 中国经济陷入困境，李克强总理将在达沃斯发表讲话
item.description: Chinese Premier Li Qiang is set to address global investors and politicians in Davos on Tuesday, as Beijing grapples with a sluggish post-pandemic recovery and a real estate slump.翻译:中国总理李强将于周二在达沃斯向全球投资者和政界人士发表讲话，目前北京正在努力应对疫情后复苏缓慢和房地产市场低迷的问题。
item.author: Antoni Slodkowski

item.title: 焦点：大众汽车及其竞争对手正在攻克固态电池难题
item.description: Volkswagen, whose drive to develop a "solid-state" electric car battery with U.S. startup QuantumScape has been dogged by delays, is casting its net wider in pursuit of the potentially game-changing technology.翻译:大众汽车与美国初创公司 QuantumScape 合作开发“固态”电动汽车电池的计划一直被拖延，但目前该公司正在扩大网络，以追求这项可能改变游戏规则的技术。
item.author: Eric Onstad, Paul Lienert

item.title: 太平洋国家齐聚中国讨论海军问题
item.description: Naval officials from countries bordering the Pacific, such as Japan, Russia and the United States, are meeting from Tuesday in China's eastern city of Nanjing to discuss updating rules on unexpected encounters, among other issues, state media said.翻译:官方媒体称，日本、俄罗斯和美国等太平洋沿岸国家的海军官员将于周二在中国东部城市南京举行会议，讨论更新意外遭遇规则等问题。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 新疆雪崩致约1000名游客被困
item.description: The tourists remain stranded in a remote holiday village after avalanches hit China's northwestern Xinjiang region with metres-high snow and fickle weather impeding evacuation.翻译:雪崩袭击了中国西北部的新疆地区，积雪高达数米，天气变化无常，阻碍了疏散，游客们仍被困在一个偏远的度假村里。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国在台湾就职前夕进行等待游戏
item.description: China's muted response to the weekend victory by Taiwan President-elect Lai Ching-te signals what some analysts see as the start of an uneasy four months before he takes office, with Beijing treading carefully before then.翻译:中国对台湾当选总统赖清德上周末的胜利反应冷淡，这表明一些分析人士认为，这是他上任前四个月不安的开始，而北京方面在此之前小心行事。
item.author: Laurie Chen, Yew Lun Tian

item.title: 碧桂园预计2024年中国房地产市场将持续疲软
item.description: China's largest private property developer, Country Garden, 2007.HK expects the property market will remain weak in 2024 and the company could face more, "severe" challenges, its top management said.翻译:中国最大的私人房地产开发商碧桂园，2007.HK 高层表示，预计 2024 年房地产市场将持续疲软，该公司可能面临更多“严峻”挑战。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 台积电Q4利润下滑23% 今年重点关注需求反弹
item.description: Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co Ltd , is expected to report a 23% drop in fourth-quarter profit on Thursday, but analysts predict better growth this year on the back of rebounding demand.翻译:台积电周四预计第四季度利润下降 23%，但分析师预计，由于需求反弹，今年的增长将有所改善。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 马科斯总统祝贺台湾黎智英后菲​​律宾重申“一个中国政策”
item.description: The Philippines' foreign ministry on Tuesday reaffirmed the country's "One China policy" after its president, Ferdinand Marcos Jr., congratulated Taiwan's new leader Lai Ching-te.翻译:在菲律宾总统小费迪南德·马科斯向台湾新领导人赖清德表示祝贺后，菲律宾外交部周二重申了该国的“一个中国政策”。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 美国谴责瑙鲁“不幸”放弃台湾，并对中国的承诺发出警告
item.description: The U.S. official who heads the body that handles unofficial ties with Taiwan on Tuesday decried Nauru's "unfortunate" decision to break ties with Taipei shortly after an election and warned that Beijing's promises often go unfulfilled.翻译:负责处理与台湾非正式关系的机构负责人周二谴责瑙鲁在选举后不久做出的与台北断交的“不幸”决定，并警告说北京的承诺常常没有兑现。
item.author: Ben Blanchard

item.title: 股市暴跌，美元因利率前景紧张而上涨
item.description: Asian shares hit a one-month low, U.S. stock futures fell and the dollar rose on Tuesday as hawkish remarks from central bankers tempered expectations for interest rate cuts and traders waited to hear from the Fed's influential Christopher Waller.翻译:周二，亚洲股市触及一个月低点，美国股指期货下跌，美元上涨，原因是央行行长的鹰派言论削弱了降息预期，且交易员等待美联储颇具影响力的克里斯托弗·沃勒(Christopher Waller)的讲话。
item.author: Tom Westbrook

item.title: 格鲁吉亚执政党领导人访华推动深化双边关系
item.description: The leader of Georgia's ruling party began a six-day visit to China on Monday, as the European Union candidate member country seeks to deepen its relations with Beijing, Georgian media reported.翻译:据格鲁吉亚媒体报道，格鲁吉亚执政党领导人周一开始对中国进行为期六天的访问，这个欧盟候选成员国寻求深化与北京的关系。
item.author: Felix Light

item.title: 玩具制造商从中国转移并非易事
item.description: Toy makers grappling with surging costs in China are finding no easy options when it comes to shifting production to cheaper places.翻译:正在努力应对中国成本飙升的玩具制造商在将生产转移到更便宜的地方时没有找到简单的选择。
item.author: Richa Naidu

item.title: 中国与瑞士签署扩大贸易宣言
item.description: China and Switzerland signed a joint declaration on Monday agreeing to deepen their partnership after Premier Li Qiang met the Swiss President, the Swiss government said.翻译:瑞士政府表示，李强总理会见瑞士总统后，中国和瑞士周一签署了一份联合声明，同意深化合作伙伴关系。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 解释者：胡塞武装袭击暴露了中国在红海的商业利益
item.description: China has called for an end to attacks on civilian vessels in the Red Sea that have dramatically widened the Hamas-Israel conflict and placed Beijing's commercial interests along the Suez Canal at risk.翻译:中国呼吁停止对红海民用船只的袭击，这种袭击极大地扩大了哈马斯与以色列的冲突，并使北京在苏伊士运河沿岸的商业利益面临风险。
item.author: Joe Cash

item.title: 朝鲜黑客与犯罪分子在东南亚共享洗钱网络 - 联合国
item.description: North Korean hackers are sharing money-laundering and underground banking networks with fraudsters and drug traffickers in Southeast Asia, according to a United Nations report published on Monday, with casinos and crypto exchanges emerging as key venues for organised crime.翻译:根据周一发布的联合国报告，朝鲜黑客正在与东南亚的欺诈者和毒贩共享洗钱和地下银行网络，赌场和加密货币交易所成为有组织犯罪的主要场所。
item.author: Tom Wilson

item.title: 解释者：为什么马尔代夫希望印度军队撤离
item.description: The new Maldives president set a deadline on Sunday of March 15 for its giant neighbour India to withdraw all its troops from the tiny Indian Ocean archipelago nation.翻译:马尔代夫新任总统于 3 月 15 日星期日为邻国印度设定了从这个印度洋群岛小国撤军的最后期限。
item.author: Krishn Kaushik

item.title: 2024年中国经济增速预计将放缓至4.6%，引发政策制定者的关注
item.description: China's economic growth is likely to slow to 4.6% in 2024, and cool further to 4.5% in 2025, a Reuters poll showed, raising the heat on policymakers to roll out more stimulus measures amid deflationary pressures and a severe property slump.翻译:路透调查显示，中国经济增长可能在2024年放缓至4.6%，并在2025年进一步降温至4.5%，在通货紧缩压力和房地产严重下滑的情况下，政策制定者推出更多刺激措施的压力加大。
item.author: Kevin Yao

item.title: 随着竞争加剧，苹果在中国以罕见的折扣出售 iPhone 15
item.description: Apple is offering rare discounts on its iPhones in China, cutting retail prices by as much as 500 yuan ($70) amid growing competitive pressure in the world's biggest smartphone market.翻译:由于全球最大智能手机市场的竞争压力日益加大，苹果公司在中国为其 iPhone 提供罕见的折扣，零售价降低了 500 元人民币（合 70 美元）。
item.author: Josh Ye

item.title: 菲律宾军方将在南海开发岛屿
item.description: The Philippines will develop islands in the South China Sea that it considers part of its territory to make them more habitable for troops, Manila's military chief Romeo Brawner told reporters on Monday.翻译:马尼拉军事参谋长罗密欧·布劳纳周一对记者表示，菲律宾将在南海开发岛屿，这些岛屿被认为是其领土的一部分，以使这些岛屿更适合军队居住。
item.author: Reuters
